website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for consumers who don't need a large set but want well-made tools that are built to last and backed by the company.
pros: Durable tools with the Craftsman name that is recognized for its quality and the lifetime tool warranty
Convertible to external or internal just like larger sets
cons: If you need more tools for your shop or garage, this duo probably won't be enough to accomplish all of your jobs
May not work with large snap rings

customer_reviews.title: Worked pretty well, but need a slight design change
customer_reviews.text: Worked pretty well to take apart some ratchet wrenches to relube. I did notice that the way they are set up, it's kind of hard to fully squeeze some retaining rings to remove them without having the vinyl handles interfere. Still, they did the job. Craftsman should slightly redesign these to keep this from happening and they'd have the perfect design. Metal seems to be of good quality, and did not deform in use like many other Chinese-made tools like this (yes, most Craftsman tools are now Chinese).
customer_reviews.author: E. Klang

customer_reviews.title: First rate
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm on small snap ring removal and re-install. You can convert from internal to external with the movement of the pivot screw. If you're wrong-brained like me, and can't accept that squeezing in makes the tips move outward, you can put the screw in the other pivot hole, grip the handles with each hand and pull outward. I think you also get better leverage with those stubborn high-tension snap rings too
customer_reviews.author: DrrllM

customer_reviews.title: Expected a craftsman tool to be a little more robust ...
customer_reviews.text: Expected a craftsman tool to be a little more robust than the tool I received. They do the job as intended and save a lot of time and frustration trying to open snap rings using screwdrivers and pliers.
customer_reviews.author: Bob@Pleasanton

customer_reviews.title: This a well built tool and I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: I'd struggled with a different set of retaining ring pliers with interchangeable heads, but it was cheap and didn't do the job. This set is well made for my purposes, home handyman, and got the stubborn ring off my KitchenAid mixer so I could lube up the shafts.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: Good pliers for daily use and worth the purchase price
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to start by saying I long for the day when Craftsman tools were made in the USA, and the value for the money was unrivalled by any other tool maker. These are completely serviceable retaining ring pliers. I remove and install many snap rings over the course of an average work week. These are far superior to pliers with replaceable tips. I've used them many times since purchasing them and would gladly buy them again based on how well they work.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Ricard

customer_reviews.title: They actually work
customer_reviews.text: These are legit even though they are made by craftsman, the little pliers are nice.
customer_reviews.author: majortomiscominghome

customer_reviews.title: Worked; good price for two pair.
customer_reviews.text: We needed these pliers to replace a gear in my Kitchen Aid Stand Mixer, and this set came with two sizes for less than a single pair of retaining ring pliers at any of our local hardware stores or the big box stores. They did the job.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These do the job. Much better than the OEM brand snap plier.
customer_reviews.author: roketengineer

customer_reviews.title: highy recommend these
customer_reviews.text: This is the tool you've been looking for. If you are irritated with cheap snap ring pliers bending and breaking then look no further. I am a maintenance tech and I use these everyday and have put them to the test. I couldn't be happier with these . highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: John Johnson

customer_reviews.title: These tools work good
customer_reviews.text: They get the job done. Seem pretty good for the price. I use them for industrial work in a factory.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: used them to remove the large 2 inch snap ring, work great
customer_reviews.author: Starr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The retaining pliers are good quality. What you would expect from Craftsman.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Young

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These seem as good as more expensive brands I've used. Lifetime warranty too.
customer_reviews.author: Upper Michigan user

customer_reviews.title: My second pair in 6 years, they do the ...
customer_reviews.text: My second pair in 6 years , they do the job well and hold up to everyday use. Craftsman is a lot more picky about warranty now .
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Good bang per buck
customer_reviews.text: Way better than harbor freight. About the same price. Need I say more?
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Work Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These are the real deal, not some cheap version. I know because I have been through several cheap pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Jason E.

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: One of the tips on the small pair broke off after about 4 or 5 uses. The large pair still works fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Stahl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for the garage and all my projects!
customer_reviews.author: Chris M Echols

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set of pliers. Second set I've ordered. I use them most every day with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Homeowners Set
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace the gears in a couple of ratchets. Overall, these did an excellent job. Having the two sizes was helpful as one size may not fit all applications. Not sure I'd want to rely on this set for heavy duty use (like as a professional machinist).. but for the occasional homeowner this is perfect. Took a little bit of practice to figure out how to use it.. but once I practiced a few moments, I was all set
customer_reviews.author: Richard Joseph Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Smaller sizes than expected
customer_reviews.text: They work bu are overpriced for what you get. These are for 1 inch or less size snaprings
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected. Takes some getting used to with ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected. Takes some getting used to with seating onto snap rings correctly. They are reversible. Just unscrew from original hole and reinstall in line with secondary hole.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WHO SAID THEY WERE PERFECT FOR WHAT HE NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT THEM FOR MY HUSBAND, WHO SAID THEY WERE PERFECT FOR WHAT HE NEEDED.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great for removing motorcycle peg pins like on a Harley Davidson
customer_reviews.text: Good for taking the pin out of a Harley passenger or rider peg. I think I used the small one for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Lover

customer_reviews.title: Simple tool for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: These are simple tools worth the money. You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: TKP

product_meta.title: Craftsman Convertible Retaining Ring Pliers Set (2 Piece), 9-37907
product_meta.description: The Craftsman 2 Piece Snap Ring Plier Set are ideal for removing and installing .0315 -2.0 inch internal and external snap rings. They feature comfortable, double-dipped handles. Tips spread up to .038 and .070-inch Tip Diameter. The Craftsman 2 Piece Snap Ring Plier Set are an all-steel construction and precision-ground and hardened tips for durability.
feature_bullets: Services 0.315" to 2.0" internal and external rings

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars100 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
